results.deck: Diablo III: Ultimate Evil Edition brings both Diablo III and its expansion, Reaper of Souls, to consoles (including the series' debut on PlayStation 4 and Xbox One) in one package with several new, exclusive features.
results.name: Diablo III: Ultimate Evil Edition

results.deck: Far Cry 4 puts the player in the role of Ajay Ghale and pits him against a deadly antagonist and an even deadlier environment. Caught in the middle of a brutal Civil War while fulfilling his mother's dying wish, Ghale must fight back against the oppression of Kyrat's leader, Pagan Min, while also battling the ruthlessness of the jungle.
results.name: Far Cry 4

results.deck: Game based on the British game show.
results.name: The Cube

results.deck: A fighting game for PlayStation 3, PlayStation 4, Xbox 360, Xbox One, and PC set in the Dragon Ball Z universe.
results.name: Dragon Ball XenoVerse

results.deck: EA's annual soccer release is back for the year 2014.
results.name: FIFA 15

results.deck: SingStar returns on PlayStation 4 with the ability to transform your phone into the game's microphone.
results.name: SingStar: Ultimate Party

results.deck: Based on the 2013 summer blockbuster movie, you take the role of both "Kick Ass" and "Hit Girl" as they take on "The MotherFucker" and his band of villains.
results.name: Kick-Ass 2

results.deck: Three Ratchet & Clank installments in one pack
results.name: Ratchet & Clank: Ginga Saikyo Tristar Pack

results.deck: The finale of the Masou Kishsin branch of the Super Robot Wars franchise.
results.name: Super Robot Taisen OG Saga: Masou Kishin F: Coffin of the End

results.deck: A brand new Lego Batman game that takes Batman and Robin into an "out of this world" adventure.
results.name: Lego Batman 3: Beyond Gotham

results.deck: This Battlefield spin-off, developed by Visceral Games, focuses on the neverending battle between criminals and police officers, rather than the series' standard military setting.
results.name: Battlefield Hardline

results.deck: Based on the Steven Spielberg-produced TV series about the aftermath of an alien invasion, Falling Skies: The Game is a tactics RPG that pits a squad of resistance members against the alien invaders in tactical battles.
results.name: Falling Skies: The Game

results.deck: Another entry in the Empires series of spin-offs from the Warriors games, which replace the story mode with an empire building strategy metagame. This one is based on Dynasty Warriors 8.
results.name: Dynasty Warriors 8: Empires

results.deck: Nao, a modern day school girl, finds herself sent back in time to the Edo period.
results.name: Hanasaku Manimani

results.deck: A the second compilation of Muv-Luv side-stories.
results.name: Muv-Luv Photonmelodies

results.deck: This sequel to The Guided Fate Paradox once again puts the player in the shoes of a regular teen turned god, and dishes out some randomly generated dungeons that need crawling.
results.name: The Awakened Fate Ultimatum

results.deck: The next title in Ubisoft's hugely successful dance game franchise.
results.name: Just Dance 2015

results.deck: Sackboy arrives on PlayStation 4 with some new friends.
results.name: LittleBigPlanet 3

results.deck: Pro Evolution Soccer 2015, also known as PES 2015 and Winning Eleven 2015 in some regions, is a football simulation video game and the latest iteration in the Pro Evolution Soccer series developed by Konami Digital Entertainment.
results.name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2015

results.deck: A third person arena action game.
results.name: Bloodbath

results.deck: The 2014 edition of the annual cycling franchise.
results.name: Tour de France 2014

results.deck: Mobile Suit Gundam Side Stories is a PS3 Gundam game with 6 HD remade Gundam games and one new original game.
results.name: Mobile Suit Gundam Side Stories

results.deck: Godzilla for PlayStation 3 and 4 uses the popularity of the 2014 film as a jumping point, but spans the entire 60-year history of the franchise.
results.name: Godzilla

results.deck: A third-person Dead Island spin-off by Fatshark, focusing more on stealth and exploration than outright combat.
results.name: Escape Dead Island

results.deck: Cross-over SRPG, bringing together heroes from franchises like Gundam, Kamen Rider and Ultraman.
results.name: Super Hero Generation

results.deck: An enhanced remake of Bladestorm: The Hundred Years' War, adding fantasy monsters to the menage of enemies.
results.name: Bladestorm: Nightmare

results.deck: The third season of Telltale's graphic novel adaptation. It's expected to consist of 5 episodes.
results.name: The Walking Dead: Season Three

results.deck: Digimon All-Star Rumble returns the world of Digimon to the fast-pace fighting game genre.
results.name: Digimon All-Star Rumble

results.deck: The 2014 installment of the F1 series for Xbox 360, PlayStation 3 and PC.
results.name: F1 2014

results.deck: Assassin's Creed: Rogue takes place during the Seven Years' War in and around the American colonies. The protagonist, Shay Patrick Cormac, is an Assassin-turned-Templar who is hunting his former Brothers in the region.
results.name: Assassin's Creed: Rogue

results.deck: A sequel to XBlaze Code: Embryo, this is another visual novel set in the BlazBlue universe.
results.name: Xblaze Lost: Memories

results.deck: A remake of the classic Kunio-Kun sports competition, with such additions as a single-player story mode.
results.name: River City Super Sports Challenge: All-Stars Special

results.deck: Arcana Heart 3: LOVE MAX!!!!! is an updated version of Arcana Heart 3 featuring numerous gameplay mechanic changes and character tweaks.
results.name: Arcana Heart 3: LOVE MAX!!!!!

results.deck: Collect special Kamen Rider figurines and place them upon a portal to summon them in this fast-paced brawler.
results.name: Kamen Rider SummonRide

results.deck: A game in the Farming Simulator franchise, first released on PC on October 30, 2014. The game released on May 19, 2015 for Xbox 360, PS3, PS4, and Xbox One. The PS4 and Xbox One versions of the game feature the first online multiplayer on consoles. New to Farming Simulator 15 is the ability to transform the terrain with wood cutting tools and equipment.
results.name: Farming Simulator 15

results.deck: Revelations 2 sees the return of Claire Redfield, who along with the daughter of Barry Burton, Moira Burton, must try to escape from a monster-infested island. Meanwhile, Barry Burton himself makes his belated return as well in his attempts to save his daughter with the assistance of a little girl called Natalia Korda.
results.name: Resident Evil: Revelations 2

results.deck: WayForward and Activision deliver a game to bridge the story between the second and third seasons of Nickelodeon's Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles television series.
results.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Danger of the Ooze

results.deck: The second Gundam Breaker game once again lets the player take control of customizable Gundam model kits and wreck havoc on the rest of the product line.
results.name: Gundam Breaker 2

results.deck: A prequel to the whole Yakuza series set in 1988, starring a young Kazuma Kiryu and Goro Majima in the lead roles.
results.name: Yakuza 0

results.deck: A Lacrosse simulation game coming to PlayStation 4, Xbox One, and PC.
results.name: Lacrosse 15

results.deck: Koei-Tecmo's One Piece action-brawler series reaches its third installment and marks the series' debut on PlayStation 4 and PC.
results.name: One Piece: Pirate Warriors 3

results.deck: When The Boss is captured by Satan, it's up to Johnny Gat and Kenzie Kensington to cause as much chaos as possible in Hell to rescue them in this standalone expansion to Saints Row IV.
results.name: Saints Row: Gat Out of Hell

results.deck: An action RPG spin-off from the Dragon Quest franchise, developed by Dynasty Warriors developer Omega Force.
results.name: Dragon Quest Heroes: The World Tree’s Woe and the Blight Below

results.deck: Konami's chibi baseball sim for year 2014
results.name: Jikkyou Powerful Pro Yakyuu 2014

results.deck: The Star Wars universe enters the fray as Disney's Infinity platform grows to include a third installment.
results.name: Disney Infinity 3.0 Edition

results.deck: Try to Captain a ship and profit from your catches like the show
results.name: The Deadliest Catch: Sea of Chaos

results.deck: The Voice: I Want You is a karaoke game based on the reality TV contest.
results.name: The Voice: I Want You

results.deck: Boxing manga/anime franchise Hajime no Ippo returns for the PS3.
results.name: Hajime no Ippo: The Fighting!

results.deck: The popular reality show about a family of heavily bearded duck hunters is now a video game from Fun Labs.
results.name: Duck Dynasty

results.deck: Sengoku Hime returns, this time with 85 heroines!
results.name: Sengoku Hime 5: Senka Tatsu Haou no Keifu

results.deck: A third Sword Art Online game developed by Bandai Namco, this time set in the world of ALfheim Online.
results.name: Sword Art Online: Lost Song

results.deck: A motorcycle racing game with a heavy focus on bike customization. From the makers of the MotoGP series.
results.name: RIDE

results.deck: A third person samurai game set in the edo period, where the player joins the anti-shogunate forces of Ryoma Sakamoto.
results.name: Ukiyo no Shishi

results.deck: The final update to Dead or Alive 5 brings the game to PlayStation 4 and Xbox One. Last Round features more characters, stages, and costumes than any other Dead or Alive game to date.
results.name: Dead or Alive 5 Last Round

results.deck: A rugby game for the 2015 season, containing officially licensed teams and players from several European leagues.
results.name: Rugby 15

results.deck: A visual novel developed by Akatsuki Works.
results.name: Rui wa Tomo wo Yobu

results.deck: The third game in Dusk sub-series of the Atelier franchise, features two female protagonists both nicknamed Shallie.
results.name: Atelier Shallie: Alchemists of the Dusk Sea

results.deck: After many years of taking the franchise in different directions, Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 5 returns the Tony Hawk series to its roots.
results.name: Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 5

results.deck: Sengoku Musou 4-II is an alternate take on Sengoku Musou/Samurai Warriors 4. It adds new characters, the Dream Castle mode from Sengoku Musou Chronicle 3, and different storyline events.
results.name: Samurai Warriors 4-II

results.deck: Open world adventure about a high school student who joins the journalism club as a photographer and decides to "report" on all the beautiful girls in and around the school.
results.name: Natsuiro High School: Seishun Hakusho

results.deck: A motorcycle racing game.
results.name: Motorcycle Club

results.deck: A complete edition of Higurashi no Naku Koro ni, combining all scenarios from previous editions of the game with full voice acting.
results.name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Sui

results.deck: A defense game where the player must build up layers of defenses around his city to defend against the giant beasts that are attacking it.
results.name: Aegis of Earth: Protonovus Assault

results.deck: The 2015 edition of Koei Tecmo's long running horse racing sim.
results.name: Winning Post 8 2015

results.deck: The 10th annual edition of The Show, and the second to appear on the PlayStation 4. Featured on the cover is LA Dodgers outfielder Yasiel Puig.
results.name: MLB 15: The Show

results.deck: Examu and Nitroplus team up to release a hi-res 2D fighting game based on Nitroplus' visual novels.
results.name: Nitroplus Blasterz: Heroines Infinite Duel

results.deck: The second half of Super Robot Wars Z3 and the final entry in the Super Robot Wars Z sub-series of strategy RPGs.
results.name: Dai 3-Ji Super Robot Taisen Z Tengoku-hen

results.deck: A 3D tag-team fighting game based on the JoJo's Bizarre Adventure series.
results.name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Eyes of Heaven

results.deck: An expanded version of Deception IV, with additional modes and new playable characters.
results.name: Deception IV: The Nightmare Princess

results.deck: The Shonen Jump crossover fighter J-Stars Victory Vs gets an expanded, international release on PlayStation 3, PlayStation Vita, and PlayStation 4.
results.name: J-Stars Victory Vs+

results.deck: An upcoming video game from Big Ant Studios, makers of Don Bradman Cricket. The game will feature official teams from the NRL, Super league and all accompanying lower leagues.
results.name: Rugby League Live 3

results.deck: An enhanced version of hack n' slash title Sengoku Basara 4, with new characters and a PS4 version.
results.name: Sengoku Basara 4 Sumeragi

results.deck: A Free 2 Play online full open world game for the PS3, PS4 and PC.
results.name: Dragon's Dogma Online

results.deck: Like Continuum Shift before it, BlazBlue: Chrono Phantasma receives an "Extend" version, increasing the character count, developing further storylines, tweaking balance, and more.
results.name: BlazBlue: Chrono Phantasma Extend

results.deck: Lego Avengers is a Lego game based on the Marvel Cinematic Universe.
results.name: LEGO Marvel's Avengers

results.deck: Relive the action of all four Jurassic Park films - in LEGO video game form!
results.name: LEGO Jurassic World

results.deck: Set 40 years after the events of Black Ops II, the twelfth installment of the Call of Duty series brings advanced robotics and biotic augmentations to the clandestine operations of the Black Ops storyline.
results.name: Call of Duty: Black Ops III

results.deck: The 2015 edition of Konami's long-running series of Japanese baseball games.
results.name: Pro Yakyuu Spirits 2015

results.deck: The first expansion pack for Final Fantasy XIV, featuring new areas, jobs, flying mounts, player race and more.
results.name: Final Fantasy XIV: Heavensward

results.deck: A remastered release of Dark Souls II, featuring a graphical upgrade, increased online player limit, remixed locations for items and enemies, and includes all of the previously released DLC.
results.name: Dark Souls II: Scholar of the First Sin

results.deck: The 2015 edition of the official Grand Prix motorcycle racing game.
results.name: MotoGP 15

results.deck: A "true sequel" to the original Steins;Gate that takes place in the distant future on an alternate timeline.
results.name: Steins;Gate 0

results.deck: Dragon Quest hack-and-slash action returns for a second outing.
results.name: Dragon Quest Heroes II

results.deck: A video game version of the Turbo edition of the venerable Top Trumps card game.
results.name: Top Trumps Turbo

results.deck: Fantasy SRPG Utawarerumono gets a sequel over a decade since the original's release.
results.name: Utawarerumono: Itsuwari no Kamen

results.deck: The Lego brand's first foray into the burgeoning "toys-to-life" genre, Dimensions will include characters from properties like The Lord of the Rings, DC Comics, and The Wizard of Oz.
results.name: LEGO Dimensions

results.deck: A fighting game based on the Saint Seiya franchise, and the follow-up to Brave Soldiers.
results.name: Saint Seiya: Soldiers’ Soul

results.deck: Tri-Ace returns for a fifth outing in its long running sci-fi JRPG series.
results.name: Star Ocean: Integrity and Faithlessness

results.deck: An FMV-focused take on Guitar Hero.
results.name: Guitar Hero Live

results.deck: A visual novel based on the Infinite Stratos franchise.
results.name: Infinite Stratos 2: Love and Purge

results.deck: An adventure game based on the Adventure Time license where Finn and Jake dig into their parent's past as detectives, and decide to do some detecting themselves.
results.name: Adventure Time: Finn and Jake Investigations

results.deck: A fighting game based on the Kung Fu Panda series.
results.name: Kung Fu Panda: Showdown of Legendary Legends the Video Game

results.deck: Various football players are already duking it out for the rights to be named the cover athlete for this year's Madden release.
results.name: Madden NFL 16

results.deck: EA's long-running soccer franchise returns for yet another year.
results.name: FIFA 16

results.deck: EA's respected hockey franchise returns yet again with NHL 16.
results.name: NHL 16

results.deck: A Musou/Warriors game based on the novel/manga Arslan Senki
results.name: Arslan: The Warriors of Legend

results.deck: An action RPG for PlayStation platforms set in a world where no-one sleeps.
results.name: Nights of Azure

results.deck: Konami's long-running soccer franchise returns for a 2015 release, taking more advantage of the Fox Engine, among many other improvements.
results.name: Pro Evolution Soccer 2016

results.deck: An update to last year's NASCAR '14 with 2015 drivers and tracks by new developer DMi Games.
results.name: NASCAR '15

results.deck: Bigben continues its series of handball games, this time with new developer Eko Software.
results.name: Handball 16
